name: ACID Encrypted File
summary: Learn about .ACID files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: ACiD (A Covert Identity) is an application used to encrypt files with sensitive information. It can encrypt one file or an entire directory with an encryption key generated by a quantum random number generator. The program can be used to secure files on your computer or when sending files via email.
NOTE: AciD is discontinued and no longer available.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
